name: DON'T LET ME FALL
description:
DON'T LET ME FALL

Mary and Dave an adventure couple had a mishap on their journey, help get out of it.

This is an action platformer game playable in browser,published for the Lost Relic Game Jam .

The particularity of this game is to move 2 players alternatively from platform to another, the game test your address and give you some puzzle to solve.

If you find the game a little hard, I really encourage you to go all the way, there are only 4 levels which contain a lot of points to save your progress.
